refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: This step runs a Python program as the implementation of a step.

refsection.title: Installation
refsection.para: The cx:python step is not included in the standard XML Calabash release. You must obtain it separately and install it on your classpath before you can use this step. See cx:polyglot for more details.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The cx:python step runs a Python program as the implementation of a step.
